listing_by_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'vmbox' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'mailbox': doc.mailbox}); }

listing_by_mailbox.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'vmbox' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.mailbox,  {'id': doc._id, 'mailbox': doc.mailbox}); }
